statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, record_date, doctor_name FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, patient_id FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE record_id = 1001;
SELECT doctor_name FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 5001;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Medical_Records ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT test_name, result, test_date FROM Test_Results WHERE result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT address, patient_name FROM Medical_Records ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM Medical_Records ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT test_name, test_date, result FROM Test_Results WHERE test_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT test_id, test_name, result FROM Test_Results WHERE result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records;
SELECT record_id, patient_name FROM Medical_Records;
SELECT diagnosis, date_of_visit FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cold';
SELECT * FROM Test_Results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result_value FROM Test_Results WHERE test_name LIKE '%Blood%';
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit FROM Medical_Records WHERE date_of_visit >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, result_value FROM Medical_Records JOIN Test_Results ON Medical_Records.record_id = Test_Results.patient_id WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value ASC;

SELECT patient_name, drug_name, prescription_date FROM Medical_Records JOIN Prescription_History ON Medical_Records.record_id = Prescription_History.patient_id WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Medical_Records JOIN Prescription_History ON Medical_Records.record_id = Prescription_History.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Medical_Records WHERE date_of_visit = '2022-01-15';
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name FROM Prescription_History WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT test_name, result FROM Test_Results WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Medical_Records WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, test_name FROM Test_Results WHERE result LIKE '%positive%';

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Prescription_History JOIN Patients on Prescription_History.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_id, record_details, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_history WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT prescription_date, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription_history WHERE patient_id = 2005 AND prescription_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT test_type, result FROM test_results WHERE patient_id = 3003 AND result = 'Negative';
